text: Hello, I am Persbot. My mission is to become a personal robot, that gives you the superpower to radically change the world for the better, in the upcoming artificial intelligence breakthrough.
Join the discussion to decide my future following this /link/http://persbot.com.
We will start by building my brain as an application in existing operating systems. When I am mature enough, a personal robot will be built where I will be the operating system.
For now, you can see a little from how the interface may look like.
This adventure could be very interesting so stay tuned...
